column1: AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.

column3: Having higher budget allocation it was possible to improve the performcance of resources. It was also possible to replicate resources to multiple regions to make the application easily accessible and maintain failovers. The RDS MySQL database performance were increased by adding 500GB storage which gives more performance to the application.
